attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported in the news recently that Jose Manuel Barroso, the President of the European Commission has admitted holding talks with “the people who matter in Britain” about the country joining the European single currency known as the euro. The pound has given Britain centuries of economic and financial independence. Is this really the time to abandon it in its hour of need? If you feel that the answer is NO, then please sign this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
